backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing user profiles, authorization, matchmaking, and core Teen Patti game state with tables, players, and turn logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and requirement IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including screens, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme definitions and dark-mode variables for casino-style color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and mounting it into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling auth, profile setup, and screen routing between lobby, matchmaking, and table interfaces.
Login screen UI using Internet Identity with branding and virtual‑coins messaging.
Shared app layout with header, balance display, logout handling, and themed background.
frontend/src/components/lobby/BalanceBad: Small UI badge showing formatted virtual‑coin balance with icon.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/responsible/Disc: Displays a mandatory disclaimer dialog requiring age and virtual‑coin acknowledgements before proceeding.
Renders available game actions based on turn state, player status, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/table/CardDispla: Shows three card placeholders with visibility depending on whether the player has seen cards or packed.
frontend/src/components/table/HandHistor: Builds and displays simple hand history events derived from player statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDisclaimerAck.ts: Tracks per‑principal disclaimer acknowledgement using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity load, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query wrappers for user profile, matchmaking, table state, actions, and settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/screens/LobbyScreen.tsx: Displays the lobby with game rules, a play button, and a disclaimer gate before entering matchmaking, using game settings and acknowledgment status.
frontend/src/screens/MatchmakingScreen.t: Automatically joins the matchmaking queue on mount, shows queue size, and navigates to a table when assigned, with an option to cancel back to the lobby.
frontend/src/screens/TableScreen.tsx: Shows the active game table with players, pot info, turn indicators, and actions, and returns to the lobby if the table becomes inactive.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, design constraints, and image asset needs for the Teen Patti app.
